children.name: change
Example - subscribe to the "change" event during initialization

children.description: Fires when the configuration or the data of the sheet change.

children.name: unhideRow

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the row

children.description: Shows the hidden row at the provided index. Does not have any effect if the row is already visible.

children.name: unhideColumn

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the column

children.description: Shows the hidden column at the provided index. Does not have any effect if the column is already visible.

children.name: toJSON
Example - Serialize the sheet as JSON

children.description: Serializes the sheet in the format defined in the [sheet configuration](/api/javascript/ui/spreadsheet#configuration.sheets).

children.name: selection
children.description: Returns a range with the current active selection.

children.name: rowHeight

parameters.name: width `Number` *optional*
parameters.description: If passed, the method will set the height of the row at the passed index.

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the row

children.description: Gets or sets the height of the row at the given index.

children.name: range

parameters.name: ref `String`
parameters.description: [A1](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb211395.aspx) or [RC notation](http://excelribbon.tips.net/T008803_Understanding_R1C1_References.html) reference of the cells.

children.description: Returns a [Range](/api/javascript/spreadsheet/range) for the given range specification.

children.name: insertRow

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the column

children.description: Inserts a new, empty row at the provided index. The contents of the spreadsheet (including the ones in the current row index) are shifted down.

children.name: insertColumn

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the column

children.description: Inserts a new, empty column at the provided index. The contents of the spreadsheet (including the ones in the current column index) are shifted to the right.

children.name: hideRow

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the row

children.description: Hides the row at the provided index.

children.name: hideColumn

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the column

children.description: Hides the column at the provided index.

children.name: frozenRows

parameters.name: count `Number` *optional*
parameters.description: The amount of columns to be frozen. Pass `0` to remove the frozen pane.

children.description: Gets or sets the amount of frozen rows displayed by the sheet.

children.name: frozenColumns

parameters.name: count `Number` *optional*
parameters.description: The amount of columns to be frozen. Pass `0` to remove the frozen pane.

children.description: Gets or sets the amount of frozen columns displayed by the sheet.

children.name: fromJSON

parameters.name: data `Object`
parameters.description: The object to load data from.  This should be **the deserialized object**, not the JSON string.

children.description: Loads the sheet from an object in the format defined in the [sheet configuration](/api/javascript/ui/spreadsheet#configuration.sheets).> The configuration and cell values will be merged.

children.name: deleteRow

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the row

children.description: Deletes the contents of the row at the provided index and shifts the remaining contents of the sheet up.

children.name: deleteColumn

parameters.name: Example
parameters.description:
```
```

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the column

children.description: Deletes the contents of the column at the provided index and shifts the remaining contents of the sheet to the left.

children.name: batch

parameters.name: changeEventArgs `Object`
parameters.description: The change event arguments that will be used for the change event triggered after the callback finishes executing.

parameters.name: callback `Function`
parameters.description: The sequence of actions that will be executed without triggering a change event.

children.description: Suppresses triggering of change events for a sequence of actions. Triggers a single change event at the end of the sequence.Greatly improves performance when calling multiple methods that change the sheet state, as the widget will be refreshed once.

children.name: columnWidth

parameters.name: width `Number` *optional*
parameters.description: If passed, the method will set the width of the column at the passed index.

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the column

children.description: Gets or sets the width of the column at the given index.

children.name: clearFilter

parameters.name: indexes `Number|Array`
parameters.description: The column index(es)

children.description: Clears the filters for the passed column index. If an array is passed, `clearFilter` will clear the filter for each column index.
